favourite-a-station-by-clicking-the-star: Favourite a station by clicking the star icon
this-station-is-in-two-zones: This station is in two ticket zones
no-trams-are-currently-running-from-this: No trams are currently running from this platform.
this-may-be-due-to-end-of-service: This may be due to maintenance work or End of Service.
about-app: This is an unofficial Manchester Trams app built with ☕ by
data-collection-message: This app tracks events such as when a user searches for a station to help understand how users interact with the app. None of the information collected is personally identifying. By doing this, I can improve the app over time for everyone with new features and bug fixes
feedback-message: To leave feedback about the app, or suggest new features, reach out via email.
support-development-message: To remove ads, and support development of this app, feel free to purchase one of the following products below.
